casebody.data:
Tobias Oberfelder, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided May 2, 1892. Appeal by defendants from judgment entered upon decision of a judge at special term in the plaintiff’s favor. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and Brainard Tolles of counsel, for appellants. E. B. & C. P. Cowles, for respondent.

Before Freedman, P. J., and McAdam, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
